snippet: Ms. Bigelow, a winner with the NYFCC for "The Hurt Locker," won again as best director of "Zero Dark Thirty," her unflinching look at the hunt for Osama bin Laden.
abstract: Ms. Bigelow, a winner with the NYFCC for "The Hurt Locker," won again as best director of "Zero Dark Thirty," her unflinching look at the hunt for Osama bin Laden.

headline.main: A Repeat Win for Kathryn Bigelow, Plus a Few Surprises From New York Film Critics Circle
